articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 13-year-old boy arrested in fatal shooting of friend in Cowlitz County
articles.description: Authorities say the boy who was arrested called 911 on the day of the shooting and said he had shot his friend while playing with a gun.

articles.author: Seattle Times editorial board
articles.title: Fund alternatives to keep truants and runaways out of jail
articles.description: State officials have been working to reduce how often counties jail children for noncriminal offenses, such as running away or skipping school. The work is not over.
